body.name: LG 32LQ630BPUA 32" Smart LED-LCD TV - HDTV - Black
features: The 32" screen size is suitable for a small-sized bedroom
16:9 aspect ratio to display content on full screen
Wireless LAN support to let you connect to the internet and have instant access to social media, listen to music, watch movies, and enjoy online games
60 Hz refresh rate to reduce blurring in fast-motion scenes
Supports PC streaming to connect gaming consoles and play games on a bigger screen with seamless control
From watching HD movies to sports leagues, sitcoms to serious talks shows, the cost-effective 720p with 1366 x 768 display is the perfect combo to let you enjoy your favorite content
Get instant access to thousands of websites, online games and social media with the built-in internet functionality
Direct LED lighting offers a brighter picture result
Features HDMI cable to connect your TV with your handheld devices

reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars remote control difficult to use

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really Nice Quality!
reviews.reviewText: A few years ago I had bought a 43 inch LG Smart TV and I was amazed at the quality, such a beautiful picture. It's easy to navigate through the different apps, more of which you can find for download at the Google Play store.That led me to buy this LG 630 model. Has the same great qualities as the one mentioned above. I'm so happy with it that I am thinking of getting a second 32-inch one for my sunroom. Do some Price shopping on this one, I'm seeing it as low as 169 at Sam's Club and I think Best Buy dropped its price to that recently also.The remote that comes with it is fairly small in the buttons are a little too close together in some rows. That was easily resolved by spending $10 on a generic LG remote that is much bigger and nicer to use.I do also have the 32-in 630
